casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nashone L. WIGGINS 280P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 30, 2018 Nashone L. Wiggins, For Wiggins, Nashone L., for State. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State.

*595The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of August 2018 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of August 2018."
